short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will give the Numerology score for a given Name

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Simple & easy-to-use extension which allow Users to quickly calculate the Numerology Score for a given Name. Choose Names for  New Born baby/ New Ventures, etc., by calculating the Exact Numerology score without any manual effort. This helps in saving huge effort/time in calculating the Numerology score. This extension has gone through a thorough testing and is very accurate thereby avoiding any error in the calculation during manual process.
